definition: loose ice crystals formed during the early stages of freezing of salt water

examples: Cut watermelon into small chunks and freeze, then blend frozen fruit and buttermilk to make a cooling fruit slush.

definition: refuse grease and fat from cooking especially on shipboard
trashy and usually cheaply sentimental material
unsolicited writings submitted (as to a magazine) for publication
to wet or splash with slush
to make one's way through slush
